description: External iron balcony and spiral staircase to the rear; replacement of rear window with timber framed double glazed door; new timber framed double glazed window to the rear
decision_conditions: <p>Privacy Screening</p><p><br></p><p>Prior to the usage of the proposed rear balcony area, the privacy screening (metal mesh screen) shown on the hereby approved plans shall be fully installed as to prevent any unduly detrimental privacy interactions between neighbours, and shall be retained as such thereafter.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Reason: To safeguard the privacy and amenity of neighbouring residents.</p><div><br></div>

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>Site Location Plan; Existing Block Plan; 66HIG/PL100 - Proposed Lower Ground Floor Partial Plan; 66HIG/PL101 - Proposed Ground Floor Partial Plan; 66HIG/PL200 - Proposed Partial Section Showing Rear of House;&nbsp; 66HIG/PL301 - Proposed Rear Elevation; 66HIG/S100 - Existing Lower Ground Floor; 66HIG/S101- Existing Ground Floor; 66HIG/S200 - Existing Partial Section Showing Rear of House; 66HIG/S301 - Existing Rear Elevation; 66HIG/S301(2) - Existing Rear Elevation; Design and Access Statement; Heritage Statement; Fire Safety â€“ Reasonable Exception Statement</p><p>All documents received 06.01.25</p><div><br></div>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
